Articles.Content:
Simple game, write a short (3 paragraphs max) story about the above KSP topic or idea. Then, post your own idea for the next guy! All normal forum rules apply, of course.

Lets start with a simple one: Jeb's first launch, way back in 0.7.3!

Ended in explosions

Bill Kerman wanted to go to the Koo to see a walrus for the first time.

Edited September 28, 2014 by MrWalrus123

he saw the walruses and the seals. 3 months later he came back and saw the sealruses. whatever tohse are.

kirrim kerman was sent tolaythe to destroyit before it could be crashed into the neraest planet
